text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 18
The case concerns the length of civil proceedings brought by the applicant company in May 1987 and still pending (about 13 years).
Article 41 - The Court awarded the applicant 1,500,000 escudos (PTE) in respect of damages and 250,000 escudos in respect of costs and expenses.
